name: conventionality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being traditional and ordinary or a part of something that is like this: The artists were drawn to one another by their rejection of conventionality. She observes the conventionalities of middle class life. See
conventional
More examplesFewer examplesWhat I want is free expression, not conventionality.The film emphasizes the grinding conventionality of the character's life in the suburbs.He seemed to be completely ignorant of the conventionalities of custom and of taste.Conventionality is concerned with the maintenance of conventions.
